name: Nass Nasreen- Endless Runner
description:
Rahim is furious due to mischievous activities of Nasreen. Their fight has made its way to cricket stadium where the epic chase battle begins in new game of 2019 Nass Nasreen- Endless runner. Nasreen is running at full speed while Rahim is chasing her in cricket stadium right between the match. Public is shouting in favor of Nasreen but Rahim looks confident to catch her. Can Rahim catch Nasreen??

Nass Nasreen- Endless runner is filled with challenging path around cricket stadium. Run as fast as you can to escape from angry Rahim. People are watching epic running battle battle between Rahim & Nasreen in cricket stadium. This Cricket season has brought energy in Nasreen as she is running in full speed. Swipe to jump & slide and Tap to move right and left to avoid obstacles. Let’s see how far can Nasreen run!

Features of Nass Nasreen- Endless runner

• Endless Challenging game
• Amazing HD graphics
• Rahim & Nasreen Voice overs
• Cricket Stadium Environment
• Avoid obstacles and run as far you can
